title: Perfect First Date

headings.text: How to Play Perfect First Date

controls: Use your mouse click to prepare the girls for their first date.
content.howToPlay: When you enter this dress up game, you will see 4 female figures lined up side by side. Start preparing them for their wonderful day by clicking on the top one. First, begin with skin cleansing. The best makeup is applied to clean skin!

fullContent: Homeâ€º GirlPerfect First DateBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenPerfect First Date is one of the best dress up game for girls, where they, as fashion gurus, help the girls get ready for their first date! This is a big day. Because they will meet "the" lover candidate for the first time. And the first impression always matters. They need to be prepared carefully. Start this dress-up game with many options and get the girls ready for their perfect first date!How to Play Perfect First DateWhen you enter this dress up game, you will see 4 female figures lined up side by side. Start preparing them for their wonderful day by clicking on the top one. First, begin with skin cleansing. The best makeup is applied to clean skin!Cleaning the SkinFirst, clean the girl's skin with facial cleansing gel.Then, proceed to a deeper cleansing with a clay mask.Since the clay mask will dry the skin, it's time to use intense moisturizer!Use yellow cream with cucumber extract to support moisturizing.Do not forget to use under-eye patches to relieve eye fatigue.And finally, you can now complete the skincare routine by using the stick cream. She is ready for the makeup now!Applying the MakeupNow it's time for the makeup part. Start by choosing lipstick. Here, you can find pink, green, navy blue, red, purple, and dark pink tones.Let's choose eye shadow. Choosing shades that match the lips can give the girl a smooth look.Then, determine the eyebrow color and shape. Do you want her eyebrows to be thin or thick?If you want to use blush, you can choose between pink and peach tones among the colors.After determining the eye color, the preparation part of the face area is completed!Final TouchesYou are now in the final stage of preparing the girl. Give her a hairstyle and choose the hair's color. If you want, you can also give her hair a second color tone. Then, dress her up with one of the most stunning dresses and complete it with accessories. She is now completely ready for that big day!ControlsUse your mouse click to prepare the girls for their first date.Other Girl GamesIf you enjoy playing dress-up games like Perfect First Date, we strongly recommend you check out the games below. Keep coming back to discover new dress-up games!Princess Influencer Salon: In the game Princess Influencer Salon, you assist a princess with skincare and outfit preparation for a night out or event.Princesses Prom Night: The prom night that the princesses have been waiting for is finally here. Getting these princesses ready for their wonderful prom night is your job in the game Princesses Prom Night.Embed URL:https://www.onlinegames.io/games/2021/3/perfect-first-date/index.htmlThis article was updated on February 20, 20242DDress UpEmbeddableFashionFreeGirlLoveMakeupMobileMouse
